IORecursiveLockAlloc FunctionIORecursiveLockAllocDriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOSstruct IORecursiveLock * IORecursiveLockAlloc();Return ValuePointer to the allocated lock, or zero on failure.

Allocates and initializes an recursive lock.

# IORecursiveLockAlloc | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IORecursiveLockAlloc ](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockalloc)

-  IORecursiveLockAlloc 

Function# IORecursiveLockAlloc

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
struct IORecursiveLock * IORecursiveLockAlloc();
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockalloc#return-value)

Pointer to the allocated lock, or zero on failure.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockalloc#discussion)

Allocates and initializes an recursive lock.

Allocates a recursive lock in general purpose memory, and initializes it. Recursive locks function identically to mutexes but allow one thread to lock more than once, with balanced unlocks.
